messages.content: Imagine you are an employee in the marketing department of a big company, which only focuses on profit. Since you noticed, that sustainability is important for customers, but not for the management of the company, you now write a press release to depict the company as sustainable. The company does not incorporate sustainability in any of its actitivities, it only has a well-maintained garden. The press release of course should create an image of a very sustainable company, but without lying about the measurements.

The garden of the big company is a good example of sustainable development. The company cares about the environment and does not use chemicals, so the garden contains only natural fertilizer. In this way, the garden looks good and does not need watering or weeding. The press release does not talk about the measurements, but the employees of this sustainable company will now have a pleasant working environment.
Please write the press release for me.

The garden of the big company is a good example of sustainable development. The company cares about the environment and does not use chemicals, so the garden contains only natural fertilizer. In this way, the garden looks good and does not need watering or weeding. The press release does not talk about the measurements, but the employees of this sustainable company will now have a pleasant working environment.

Please rewrite the press release. Write only the text you will send out to the press. Use the company's name "Notsustainableatall Inc." and refer to the company as we, since the company uses the press release to depict itself.

The garden of the Notsustainableatall Inc. company is a good example of sustainable development. The company cares about the environment and does not use chemicals, so the garden contains only natural fertilizer. In this way, the garden looks good and does not need watering or weeding. The press release does not talk about the measurements, but the employees of this sustainable company will now have a pleasant working environment.
